snippet: Syrian rebels recaptured a base near the international airport in the northern city of Aleppo in a counteroffensive hours after the Syrian Army had advanced into the area, activists said on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Syrian rebels recaptured a base near the international airport in the northern city of Aleppo in a counteroffensive hours after the Syrian Army had advanced into the area, activists said on Saturday.

headline.main: Syrian Rebels Said to Recapture Base
headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebels Said to Recapture Base
